original_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Stuart Beattie
overview: After 15 years in the business, Stuart Beattie has learned a thing or two about how to make characters sing (or sting) on the page. Listen in as he describes how to stay hungry when you can't get anyone to read your scripts and how he came up with Pirates of the Caribbean and Collateral.
tagline: An interview series that gives an unprecedented look into the life of a working screenwriter.
title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Stuart Beattie
